website_summaries.verdict: A reversible pillow that allows you to choose between a plush side and a cool side.
pros: Stands out for the double-sided design that lets you switch between cool gel and memory foam
Supportive pillow is also available in a contoured design
cons: The cooling effect doesn't last as long as some users would like

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many foam pillows attempting to replicate the bounce and firmness of some old off brand pillow that I love, I found this one that has that PERFECT bounce. Not firm, not soft, just the perfect support and resilience I was looking for. Stays cool and I am a very warm sleeper. Has an extremely light fragrance, and no foam smell to get used to. I sleep better and have less pain because of this pillow. It is made of quality materials and comes with a great breathable spandex cover. Best pillow for the $
customer_reviews.author: Justin Goody

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow for my wife. She has been having neck discomfort from what I thought was her pillows. She stole my memeory foam pillow(not this brand and pretty firm) for a few nights and felt better so I grabbed this one for her. For me it is softer than I prefer (I could sleep on a cinder block) but she loves it and the scent is very light, I dont smell it in bed at all. She hasn't complained about her neck so I would say it was perfect for her needs support wise from a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: rogerseo29Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a marshmallow
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow because my old cotton one was so flat, I might as well have just been using a pillowcase. I have a foam mattress cover that makes me feel like I'm sleeping on a cloud. So why shouldn't my head get the same treatment? I was leery of the pillow at first. It felt soft and the holes were unusual. But I gave it a try. Oh my stars. It's like my head was cocooned in a marshmallow. Soft, but firm. And there was no weird bunching up of stuffing, so no need to flip to find the fluffiest side. I usually get up 4,5 times a night, but I slept 6 hours without moving. Yes please!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyG

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service to the Rescue
customer_reviews.text: This might be a good pillow for others who like midheight firm pillows. The memory foam is dense and firmer than expected. You really have to muscle your head into it to get much response. I tried to like it more, but i prefer a flatter, medium soft pillow. I loved the green tea scent though, and it did feel very cool. Update: Customer Service has been exceptional in working with me to find a better option for my preferences. Very happy with the company overall and ultimately delivering a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: stefan mcninch

customer_reviews.title: Smells really strong and not like green tea...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is advertised as green tea scented, but the scent is not green tea. It is sort of musty smelling and VERY strong. Within minutes my entire bedroom smelled awful and I had to repackage it quickly so it wouldn't keep spreading. I'm disappointed because the pillow is actually very soft and seemed like it would be really comfortable to sleep on. I just can't get past the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: The New in Pillows
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a game changer. It is ridicously supportive and stays cool for the most part. The green tea scent was a little much in the beginning but settled down once I started using the pillow. I’m never getting pillows from Target or Bed Bath and Beyond again. I bought 2 of the green tea ones and 4 of the blue ones and love em all. You can also put a pillowcase over the sleeve that comes with the pillow and it works fine. All in all, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarv Patel

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as thick as I'm used to but the cooling effect is incredible. I had horrible night sweats and this cooling pillow really made a difference. Kept my head cool which in turn kept me cool. It took a few nights to get used to sleeping with my head a little lower then I was used to but the cooling is so good I stuck with it. Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Leeberg

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting really bad neck, shoulder, and back pains from my horrible pillow. So I decided to look for a better one. When I first saw this I didn’t really know if it’ll work me as I prefer firm pillows to soft ones. Let me just tell you it is an absolute God send. The first night I used this I woke up with NO neck pain, I felt like I actually got some sleep and it actually kept cool the entire night. It is on the former side which works perfectly for me, but if you want a softer pillow this might not work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had a hard time trying to find a pillow for myself. It’s always either to hard or too soft but this one is PERFECT. It shapes my head and neck perfectly and I don’t have anymore neck problems!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This pillow beats your current pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the bomb! The perfect size and smells like green tea which I love. So far I'm impressed and I want another one for my wife. I love this style memory foam!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I found my pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found my pillow! I have had issues with sleep for years and tried every pillow you can think of, memory foam, down, synthetic, bamboo, shredded memory foam, you name it. I had finally given up, then U ran across this one and wasn't expecting much but this pillow has helped immensely. It isn't too fluffy or go flat it is awesome. I felt compelled to write a review in case it helps someone like me. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I initially really liked this pillow. The smell was relatively strong the first night, but when I added a second pillow case the smell became more mild. I loved the softness, and the pillow does not get hot at all. After using it for several days, however, my neck began to hurt. I initially thought it might be stress, so I continued using the pillow. However, last night I finally switched back to my old pillow and the neck pain went away. This pillow will be adequate for lounging around, but I'll keep hunting for a primary pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Medlin Ross

customer_reviews.title: SUPPORTIVE to the cervical spine/neck.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pillow!! I couldn’t give it 5 stars on “soft”, only because it’s a very firm pillow. Reading another review that said the same, is the reason I purchased this pillow though. I have issues with my neck and I need REAL support. I haven’t slept so well In a long time! If you need a firm(only because it’s supportive to your cervical spine-which relieves neck pain), then this is the pillow for you. It’s really cool at night as well. Thank you for providing a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the gel on the pillow, it cools you down when you lie down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Marie Sacala

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my husband because he suffers from night sweats! And he absolutely loves it! At first was unhappy because he is used to a thick pillow and was convinced it wasn’t thick enough. But after sleeping on it a few nights he not only had a dry pillow in the mornings he also noticed his neck pain had eased a good bit. I plan to buy a similar pillow myself in the near future! This pillow had no smell and seems to be excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: MellyFaye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! It keeps me cool at night and is so comfortable. I've had a hard time finding a pillow that has been able to keep me comfortable at night and help me sleep, but this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Oye
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up and it smelled like mold. The pillow is hard. Really hard. You have to warm it up before it begins to conform to your head. The only reason I gave it three stars for support is because it definitely isn't too soft. The only thing that has kept me from throwing it out and starting over is the fact my tension headaches have gone away. I think it's because of the gel layer. I've had other pillows with it and I didn't have headaches with them either. Hopefully it will soften up a little with age and use.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice pillow. The cooling gel is very nice for the hot summer nights
customer_reviews.author: mac hansson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews unless I am not happy with a product so I can save others time and money BUT!!! I truly love this pillow. It does what it says on the site. It truly helped with my neck pain. I am a hairstylist and always have pain on my shoulders and neck. I strongly recommend this pillow. P.S. I am also going through menopause, so the cool side of the pillow really helps me to cool down and sleep more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow a couple months ago because I needed something soft but firm to prevent my head from sinking into the middle of the pillow. This did the job! I'm a side sleeper and lately I've been waking up with shoulder pain. My Dr. suggested to change my pillow and I haven't any pain so far. It has a nice scent to it, however I have a pillow protector over it so I wasn't able smell too much of anything. I've been only using the gel side because it does feel cool when you first lay your head on it and its very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLove11

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: For me this pillow was softer than what I preferred so I ended up returning the item. However the couple nights i used it the pillow was very cooling. I just prefer a more firm pillow. When I returned the pillow customer service was amazing!!! They were very thoughtful and considerate and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin. Not quite what I expected as I bought it to replace my last memory foam/gel pillow that held up for years. This one is too thin to provide any real support but it is very soft. The gel doesn't seem as cooling as the one I have also...which is disappointing. Should have bit the bullet and bought a more expensive one for better quality. This is soft though and will be more of a backup/extra pillow than my main one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I purchased it to keep at my boyfriend’s house as I have a similar one at home and wanted the same amount of comfort when staying over at his house. This pillow did not disappoint! It’s the perfect amount of support for me and is cool to the touch. It’s definitely cooler than most memory foam pillows. It doesn’t stay cool through the night but definitely doesn’t make me feel uncomfortably hot. I’d definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: L. Houle

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this pillow. I have used couture pillows for over 20 years and wanted to try this one out. I have a bad neck including spurs. Unfortunately I don't know if this foam will only give when it is hot, but my pillow did not give at all. It made my neck painful. After 15 minutes of hoping it would soften I had to give it up. On the bright side if you live where it is hot the gel was cool. When I used it the temp in the bedroom was probably 60. I will stick it in front of the wood stove and see if the foam will soften.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for the value!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been sleeping on this pillow for about 1 month now, and it's amazing. Feels light like a cloud yet the pillow is dense enough that my head doesn't hit the mattress. I wasn't sure what to expect at first, but its not the typical memory foam feel, its more responsive or perhaps what I imagine latex to feel like. It craddles my head and neck perfectly. Airflow is awesome and doesn't make me want to toss my pillow around or flip it over. Ive been using another pillow cover that came with my sheet set on top of the pillow case that came standard, so it fits great. Id highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: nmscougars

customer_reviews.title: Good firm orthopedic pillow for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price for the pillow. The pillow was a bit firm for me but i had went with purchase because the pillow I purchased somewhere else is too soft. It seems to cool but honestly I don’t really feel a cooling sensation. My husband is pretty happy with it. I need to find one that’s not too firm and not too soft. I rate this in firmness 10 being really firm and 1 being really soft an 7-8. Regarding the smell that people seemed to complain about, there is one but I don’t find it that overpowering. I gave it to my husband and he’s happy with it and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Needs pillow case fore no itching but retaining cooling
customer_reviews.text: My neck has to be elevated with my head equally otherwise I find that breathing at night during sleep is difficult. This pillow doesn't help 100% but , I continually switch between this cool pillow and a buckwheat pillow. I haven't figured out what to do for better sleep yet. Plus,I'm a side sleeper, for the most part. Definitely cooler, just needs a proper pillow case... if you must have extreme coolness either get a shiny material like satin pillow case ( silk would make me sweat)....
customer_reviews.author: Conor Ripley R

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about pillows. Sleep is one if the most important health benefits in life. I have tried many memory foam pillows. This is by far the softest. It is very comfortable and does not hurt your ear sleeping on it like some other hard memory foam pillows. The only criticism is after some time it gets a little thin for me I like my head up higher. But I put a small pillow under it to prop up a little higher. That is just my personal preference. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PTD

customer_reviews.title: Did not cool at all.. Has a strong odor!
customer_reviews.text: The gel Layer proved useless, did not cool even after leaving it under a running ceiling fan! There was an odor that i was expecting it to go away after a few days but it dis not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The new pillow smell is toxicating.
customer_reviews.text: The new pillow smell is still lingering after two days. I wouldn’t call this “scent” the manufacturer claims is “harmless” as I have suffered migraines. It’s definitely the harsh chemicals the pillow is made with. You need to air it out for a day or two or it’s going to bother you greatly. I don’t know what these other buyers are talking about in terms of no smell? They must have no smell in their noses!
customer_reviews.author: Sphinx

customer_reviews.title: Really Great - Better When Stacked
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good pillow, definitely cooling. My only advice is to buy 2 per person and stack them for maximum support and comfort. Ordered 2 initially for fiancé and I, ordering 2 more Friday. Came fast but the packaging almost made me mad because it comes in a plastic packaging and not a box. I worried they would be dirty or damaged. However, the pillows were in some kind of protective packaging inside of that. It was cloth with handles and a clear plastic display in the front. They were clean. You don’t have to use a pillow case but I would for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Applewhite

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than I’d prefer, but great support.
customer_reviews.text: In the end I need support over comfort. My neck seems to be a little looser and not so tight since I started using this pillow. As a welder, I wear a welding helmet all day and the weight of that kinda gets to my neck. Not very comfortable for putting it behind your back to lean agains while watching a movie. But I figured that would be the case since it’s memory foam. I have a 10 year old gel/memory foam pillow that’s much squishier than this but doesn’t have the right shape to it and I can’t find that brand anywhere. But this pillow does the trick for now
customer_reviews.author: MoJo18

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is great and comfortable to sleep on , I’ve been getting great sleep with it. It’s nice after a long day from working to lay down and have that cooling effect from the pillow , definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfort and Cooling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the support and comfort of the pillow, but the star of this pillow is the cooling. Every time I lay my head down I am shocked at the cooling feeling that it creates. I do not live in a super hot area but at night the temps in our bedroom have been in the low 70's and I can definitely feel the difference. I am going to buy another for our camper in the future because that is where we really have warm nights sometimes. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: WeAlwaysWAnder

customer_reviews.title: Too soft...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about receiving this pillow but was ultimately disappointed. Aside from being way to soft for me, it causes me to sweat quite a bit at night, which does not help to get a good night’s rest. The one thing I liked about the pillow was it’s color!
customer_reviews.author: Seeta

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold its firmness
customer_reviews.text: Had high expectations for this pillow. I have tried so many. A friend referred me to this pillow as she loves it. For me, it’s not firm enough. I am constantly having to wake up and flip the pillow around because it doesn’t hold its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PILLOW THAT DOESN'T GO FLAT
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a month or so, so I can't speak to the longevity of the pillow. But it's extremely comfortable and doesn't lose its shape like normal pillows. The memory shape really holds its form and never gets flat throughout the night. It does have a cool side, which is nice, but the coolness doesn't last all night. I would say it stays cold for about 30 minutes-1 hour of laying on it. But I didn't get it for that, so I'm fine with that. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good- Weird Smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product an am very happy with the feel of it. It feels great and definitely helps with neck pain. HOWEVER, I don’t feel it’s of the best quality. It had small holes in it and is shrink wrapped in some weird plastic, additionally, it has a strangely weird smell that smells like musty? It smells like a towel that did not dry right in the dryer. I have wiped it down with clorox wipes and a wet towel with dish soap— but since it cannot be put in the washing machine i fear i am stuck with the odor.. i can smell it through the pillowcase. other than that it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Eriana

customer_reviews.title: Cooling
customer_reviews.text: Was not cooling me off at all, but it was comfortable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Kalyazhkina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable pillow that I’ve used so far. It is even comfortable while wearing my CPAP mask. This review is honest, but I did receive compensation for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not cold
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very comfortable to sleep on however it is not that cold. The main point of this pillow is to be a cold temperature but it is often very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want absolutely no firmness
customer_reviews.text: We requested a return and they ended up just refunding us our money and telling us to keep it so idk what that means. We wanted to return it because it’s just way too soft. Your head sinks right in it and there’s little to no support. We still use it just for extra cushion when we’re lounging in bed but I usually put it under my main pillow I use.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It's a let down...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very soft and comfortable but...it only cools for about 1-2 minutes. After that...It will lock in your body heat and you'll roast. Not the best pillow I've ever purchased. Not the worst but definitely disappointing since I bought it for the cooling feature to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't Broken in Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now. I have a hard time sleeping. I have used my old pillow thats 10 years old several times inplace of this. I have severe back problems. This pillow is very very firm and my neck has to stretch up to lay on it. For my personal use I'm not that happy with it because it is very very firm.
customer_reviews.author: laura j tremble

customer_reviews.title: Stomachs sleeper, have neck pain now
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on my stomach with an arm under my pillow. This pillow is way too soft for me. I’ve had neck pain for the first time since using this pillow. It’s great quality and my husband is a back and side sleeper and loves it. Your face falls into the pillow with no firmness if you sleep like me. Just not the right pillow for my type of sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep You Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I'm having issues with hot flashes at night. Many reviewers said it does keep cool. I'm not really sure what they're doing with their pillow that I am not, but this isn't any cooler than a normal pillow. At all. Zilch cooling in my opinion. However, it is comfortable, my husband likes it and the price is right, so I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon728

customer_reviews.title: Good support but the coolness last only 2 or 3 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I am used to be too hot during the night and I was looking for a pillow with a good support but most of all able to stay very cool. Well, this one has a good support and the right height for my neck. Unfortunately, the coolness doesn't last more than 2 or 3 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: chryschloe

customer_reviews.title: Best quality pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the perfect pillow. Not to firm and not to soft. I have finally found that pillow in the pharmedoc memory foam. I sweat a lot at night and with the cooling feature on this pillow is fantastic! You won’t be disappointed with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jredemer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing. At first I was skeptical because it seemed thin, but it is so comfortable, AND the cooling side actually cools!!! I have spent hundreds of dollars on other pillows just to end up disappointed! I am so glad I finally found this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow after airing out for just a few hours smelled fine and is so much softer than my previous $5 pillow. I feel like I now sleep like a king, it is so wonderful! The cooling gel also works well and the difference between it and the uncooled side is significant.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pillow for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The only part that I found I didn't like was the dust that came out with the pillow (not a good factor for someone with asthma and allergy issues), but overall an excellent product. One part worth noting for anyone who doesn't know, the cooling and comfort cannot be guaranteed with every pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor S Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Unlike others, I did find it soft and supportive. The smell was not pleasant and took about a week of febreezing and airing out for it to go away. The protective cover is next to impossible to get off since the opening is so small. The most disappointing part was the cooling side. When I first laid on it, it was so nice and cool. Sadly it only lasts a few minutes. I fell asleep and about an hour later I woke up and my head was so hot. I thought it was a weird night so I tried it again. Same thing. Just so disappointed. I went back to my old pillow.
customer_reviews.author: aespeck

customer_reviews.title: Really love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a little more on the firm side. Sometimes I need it to be more firm. But I love these pillows. They are awesome for migraines and when my neck swells from a disk problem. It's one of my best tools to help and prevent pain flairs. I just rotate it as needed to stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: W3B

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I sleep very warm. This pillow keeps me nice an cool. Also, I was having back issues every morning and since using this pillow, my back issues have been resolved. Great pillow - great price! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE pillow
customer_reviews.text: How is this even a pillow? It’s as stiff as a board and makes a loud thud when dropped on the ground. It’s also yellow around the edges and has the WORST smell of chemicals. I don’t think this is safe and smells pretty flammable. STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: Mason S.

customer_reviews.title: Most affordable and quality pillow for my neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I was having neck and shoulder issues and not sure what the exact link was. Trying everything I bought this pillow along with about four others to see if it would help. This pillow was the winner of the comfort and affordability contest.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Punctured zipper pull... And thumb.
customer_reviews.text: Outer bag had a punctured zipper pull that cut my thumb as I pulled it open. The pillow is fine, average softness and firmness, nice and cool, but feels smaller than my last two memory foam pillows. Not sure it matters if the packaging causes injury.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great! Need bigger size:)
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooling pad inside pillow! Wish it was a bigger size. Overall love it, helps my neck and back feel sooo much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pancake pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my Mom. Followed the directions and pillow was flat as a pancake no support whatsoever she did say it smelt good though but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: kjcjtj

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually a very comfortable pillow! This pillow is definitely worth it especially that it’s so fairly priced! I had a Columbia cooking pillow and didn’t want to spend the money for another one, I’m glad I didn’t because this one is just as great!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosella Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, great price, great investment
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely LOVE these pillows. I just placed an order for another set for our guest room. I especially love the cooling gel because I tend to sweat alot when I'm asleep. I was unaware of this brand and was unsure if I would be pleased with my purchase but luckily I took a chance on these and I'm extremely satisfied. I would highly recommend this pillow. You will not regret it. I am sleeping so much better since we've received our pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for this side sleeper.
customer_reviews.text: Was greatly relieved this pillow had/has no odor. My head does not get warm with this pillow either. When first resting my head it is quite comfortable. But within a very short time lying on it the pillow becomes hard. I am generally a side sleeper. On this pillow my ears feel like they hurt as if they have been flattened between a rock and a hard place. I wake multiple times each night because my ears hurt. Also I wake with a headache throughout the night. Not the pillow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dbar Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pillow conforms to my head and neck well enough but cooling gel doesn't stop my head from sweating
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish this pillow was just a tad less firm, it still supports my head and neck better than other pillows I've used, including other memory foam pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Erin King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Really incredible pillow! It holds its shape and I never find myself having to adjust it. The cooling gel is amazing, but tends to wear off after a 10-15 minutes - which is all I really need to get me to sleep. Definitely has a chemical smell which has faded significantly. I put my pillow outside for a day, washed the cover that came with it, and that helped significantly
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Sample

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the cooling pad but it obviously works up to a point, no miracle, so buy accordingly. Overall good pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pillow
customer_reviews.text: We have just gotten a new memory foam bed and wanted a new pillow for the bed. This pillow is simply outstanding especially for the very reasonable cost. It stays cool and provides good support and is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Papa's for my son who recently moved out on his own any absolutely loves it. He's hot blooded and always sleeps hot so this turned out to be a perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Becraft

customer_reviews.title: Great, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great, not perfect, but better than others that claim to be “cooling”! I am very happy so far, only wish for the pillow is to have the cooling cushion over a larger surface.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ebright

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling pillow
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my man. He's a little bigger person, who needs a king size pillow. He likes the cooling as he's alwayyyyyyys hot. Just wishes the pillow was a bit bigger, perfect texture/softness/support. He is interested in the non-curved option now as the other is just not his ideal pillow shape.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a much cooler sleep than standard memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I wish they made one that was 1.5 x thicker, but this was Stockwell on top of my other pillow. The cooling pad is significantly thinner than the picture shows. This is a good thing for comfort. It actually feels cool to the touch. I'm used to Tempur-Pedic pillows and this has none of the heat whatsoever. It makes a big difference in staying asleep longer.
customer_reviews.author: C-Skills

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got my son this pillow. He is very pleased with it. He likes the support it provides and is happy with the quality of sleep he is getting. I would purchase this pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Herndon

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product so far is okay, provides the support it states and is cooling. This memory foam pillow will need to be broken down or else it can be a bit stiff.
customer_reviews.author: N C

customer_reviews.title: It's like sleeping on a rock
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is like a rock, my wife dropped it on my face on accident and it gave me a bloody nose. I may have gotten one that never inflated because it is 3 inches high on one side and 2 inches on the other. No support no softness a solid mass. I waited a week it never changed. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow. Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: My. Husband loves this pillow. I got it because he is a horrible night sweater and it was getting insane lol so I got this to help him out and he loves it. He just isn't use to the memory foam part so he thinks it's a little unsupportable for him. He prefers a harder pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! This is the absolute SOFTEST memory foam pillow I have EVER HAD!!! The cooling pad is superb as well. Highly recommended...you won't be disappointed! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is horrible. It stays cool maybe? For 10-15 minutes. Then gets warm and warmer. It also leaked blue on our bed sheets. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the pillow, but they were a bit harder than I imagined and the scent they were infused with was definitely different. However they are very supportive and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good memory foam pillow
customer_reviews.text: Good pillow if you like memory foam. The adjustment to memory foam takes a bit of time but overall this pillow is great quality. I didn’t notice any smell and I’m very sensitive to chemicals so this was an unexpected bonus. My one dislike is that it is a little hot.
customer_reviews.author: KStairs

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is extremely comfortable and well worth the money. I have purchased more expensive pillows in the past and did not have the same comfort level. It has its softness but right amount of firmness. Relieved tossing and turning at night for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha Drain

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool Enough/Too Soft
customer_reviews.text: This pillow didn’t keep its coolness throughout the night for me. I found it to be too soft where my head sunk deep in it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great, supportive pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Typically, new pillows are awful to break in but this pillow left my neck and back feeling great! The cooling gel feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Cooling
customer_reviews.text: Usually I have trouble with pillows that are too soft, and that’s honestly a personal issue. This pillow is soft, but not too soft. I use one normal pillow underneath this pillow and wow, my head has great support and comfort. It forms around my head and keeps me steady. No more constantly adjusting my pillow in the middle of the of night. The cooling gel side does it’s job well, which is great for my sleeping needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this pillow. I prefer firm, bigger pillows but this one was hard as a rock. It also felt cool at first but as soon as I woke up in the middle of the night it was hot again. Overall uncomfortable and I have to force myself to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy pillows!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these pillows!! Very happy to have found them. They are very comfortable and just the right combo of softness and support.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kate Haugh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but very thin and low support
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable and soft but is very think and not supportive enough for what I would like out of a memory foam pillow
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband had a 50 dollar pillow from bed bath and beyond that looked just like this, it had to be replaced so I slipped this one in and he never noticed the difference (btw he’s very picky about pillows)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cool. Yet it’s very supportive. It came with a foam like smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow for a good nights Rest!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchase this pillow and it’s wonderful. It lasts a long time and you always get a good nights rest. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JustB

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: This pillow didn’t meet my expectations. I’m experiencing a lot of neck and shoulder pain. I got it out tried laying on it but found but it didn’t alleviate my pain. It was just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly cold and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is awesome! It stays cold and that feels like heaven. I love it so much I have ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillow for the last few nights and really love it so far. I've tried shredded memory foam pillows as well as some much more expensive solid memory foam pillows, but I really prefer how the hole-punch design allows for a much thicker pillow that still have a nice loft to it. I also have the yellow PharMeDoc pillow, which although thoroughly satisfactory is a little soft for my liking. Would buy this green one again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooling gel not cool, and not supportive
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in a very timely manner. The memory foam is very soft and squishy which is comfortable, but not quite the support I was looking for. I've had other pillows a bit firmer but still soft that I prefer. I was excited for the cooling gel side, but disappointed here as well. It does not stay cool, if it feels cool at all. Overall, I like the pillow, but not worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: good mostly firm pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm a side-sleeper and I like my head to be supported at the same height as my spine. this pillow (I got the green one) I is the perfect height for me, the correct firmness, good temp control (not hot like some mem foam pillows) because of the holes and no weird smells or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need more!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of my kids, 3 and 4 years old, and they are PERFECT. extremely plush and exactly what they needed. I'm actually going to order 2 more as a back up, you never know when they're going to discontinue them (found this out unfortunately with another brand I adored). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had various memory foam pillows and I think this one is great. Super comfy and has a nice removable cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana H

customer_reviews.title: It really is a cool pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pillow for my husband and he really likes it. He tends to get hot and this helps him stay cool at night. It really is a cool pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A hundred percent would recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are soooo soft. Bought two of them since I have already used them before. 100% would recommend. Truly memory foam meaning it remember the shapes once place upon it since it adjusts to them.
customer_reviews.author: Broken grapes

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow but won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews on this product I was convinced that this pillow was perfect for me! I have always liked my pillows to be more on the firm side but this pillow even though it’s a memory foam pillow it’s still very hard. My husband jokes and says it’s a brick. Overall it’s a good pillow but just be aware that it’s not a soft memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Carole E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Firmness
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pillow. It really does have the firmness I need to prop my head up at night. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I think this was worth the money. It's helped so much with the pain in my neck and shoulders
customer_reviews.author: christina Rulison

product_meta.title: PharMeDoc Memory Foam Pillow with Cooling Gel Reversible Orthopedic Bed Pillow Includes Removable Pillow Cover, Standard Size
feature_bullets: Reversible bed pillow has two sides: cooling gel for warm nights and plush memory foam for cooler nights
Thermoregulating Cooling Gel technology captures and diffuses heat for a cool, pleasant feeling throughout the night
Soft memory foam provides head and neck support, helping align your spine, lessening painful pressure points, and retaining shape
Removable pillow case makes cleaning quick and convenient while enduring 300+ washes
Lifetime Manufacturer Warranty Designed in California 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,106 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: AIR OUT BEFORE USE Please note that new foam products often have a distinct scent or smell. This is natural and harmless. Please remove the product from its package and allow it to "air-out" by itself in a well ventilated space. Any scent should dissipate within a few days. You can also remove the cover of the product to speed up the airing process. Although people encounter foam products every day and foam is considered to be hypoallergenic, there are some people who may be hypersensitive to the scent and/or the product components. If you are hypersensitive to foam or other similar materials, you may want to avoid contact with the product until the scent dissipates. If you experience any discomfort, or if the scent does not dissipate, you should discontinue use and return the product to your retailer.
